input_text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using item specifications and item specification below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Item specification:
Disney Sofia the First Sofia and Book Figurine

Item specifications:
Help Princess Sofia pass the Princess Test by helping her with her princess posture!
Roll the mini figure forward and watch her really balance a book atop her head
Also comes with a book she can "hold" in her hand and a purple backpack
Inspired by Disney Jr's Sofia the First
Collect all the dolls in the assortment to build a world of imaginative play
Ages 3 and older.

Product description:
input_text.Response A:
Roll into fun with the Disney Sofia the First Sofia and Book Figurine. Help Princess Sofia pass the Princess Test by helping her with her princess posture! Roll the mini figure forward and watch her really balance a book atop her head. Also comes with a book she can "hold" in her hand and a purple backpack. Inspired by Disney Jr's Sofia the First. Collect all the dolls in the assortment to build a world of imaginative play. Ages 3 and older.

The Disney Sofia the First Sofia and Book Figurine is a fun and interactive toy that inspires children to explore their imagination and creativity. With its miniature size and easy-to-use features, this figurine is perfect for little hands and provides endless hours of fun.

The toy is designed to look like the popular Disney character, Sofia the First, and comes with a book that can be placed on her head. As children roll the figurine forward, they can watch Sofia balance the book with her perfectly poised posture.

Not only is the Disney Sofia the First Sofia and Book Figurine entertaining, but it also helps children develop important skills such as fine motor skills, hand-eye coordination, and spatial awareness. With its playful design and interactive features, this toy encourages children to use their imagination and create their own stories and adventures.

Overall, the Disney Sofia the First Sofia and Book Figurine is a fun and educational toy that children and parents alike will love. Its high-quality design and attention to detail make it a durable and long-lasting addition to any child's toy collection. So why wait? Add the Disney Sofia the First Sofia and Book Figurine to your cart today and watch your child's face light up with excitement!
input_text.Response B:
Introducing the Disney Sofia the First Sofia and Book Figurine, inspired by Disney Jr's Sofia the First! This adorable mini figure of Princess Sofia comes with a book she can "hold" in her hand and a purple backpack. Help her pass the Princess Test by practicing her princess posture - simply roll the figure forward and watch her balance the book atop her head!

Collect all the dolls in the assortment to build a world of imaginative play. Recommended for ages 3 and older.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.

label_annotations.feedback: A is too short and has too little detail.  B is better, more detail and lists the product benefits
